title: Orbs
body:
Hey guys,

is it possible to get legacy skins from the "normal" skin orb? or is it really only the mega orb?

greetings,

Larykoek

replies.body:
Hey!

Yeah, I should be able to help shed some light on that.  For the Arcade event, certain orbs give out certain "prizes".  The only orb that has a chance of giving out a Legacy Skin Shard though is the Mega Orb.  The other 2 just offer Champion Shards or normal skin shards.  [You can read more about it in our Arcade Article.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-arcade-boss-world-event)

I hope this clarifies things a bit!  Let me know if you have any other questions about the event!
